text: He said all Speakers from SAARC countries would be invited for this ceremonial sitting.According to him, several veteran politicians would also be among the invitees at the event.A special Parliament session would be conducted on 3rd October to mark the 70th anniversary of Parliament, Speaker Karu Jayasuriya said. He said all Speakers from SAARC countries would be invited for this ceremonial sitting.According to him, several veteran politicians would also be among the invitees at the event.
title: Special sitting to mark Parliaments 70th anniversary
